body_html:
[Another Bug Report] Also Dropout throws error when working with LongTensors:

>>> a
tensor([ 100,    3,  100])
>>> a.float()
tensor([ 100.,    3.,  100.])
>>> d
Dropout(p=0.5)
>>> d(a.float())
tensor([ 200.,    0.,    0.]) # works fine
>>> d(a)
Floating point exception # throws error

body:
[Another Bug Report] Also Dropout throws error when working with LongTensors:

```
>>> a
tensor([ 100,    3,  100])
>>> a.float()
tensor([ 100.,    3.,  100.])
>>> d
Dropout(p=0.5)
>>> d(a.float())
tensor([ 200.,    0.,    0.]) # works fine
>>> d(a)
Floating point exception # throws error
```
